question: Will the Cavaliers beat the Heat 4-1
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Cleveland Cavaliers defeat the Miami Heat in 5 games, resulting in a 4-1 series outcome. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

If the Miami Heat win more than one game in their first round series matchup against the Cleveland Cavaliers in the 2024-2025 NBA Playoffs, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be NBA.com.

events.title: NBA Playoffs: Cavaliers vs. Heat series outcome
events.description: This is a market on the outcome of the 2024-2025 NBA Playoffs first round matchup between the Cleveland Cavaliers and Miami Heat.

question: Will the Heat beat the Cavaliers 4-3
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Miami Heat defeat the Cleveland Cavaliers in 7 games, resulting in a 4-3 series outcome. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

If the Cleveland Cavaliers win more or fewer than 3 games in their first round series matchup against the Miami Heat in the 2024-2025 NBA Playoffs, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be NBA.com.

events.title: NBA Playoffs: Cavaliers vs. Heat series outcome
events.description: This is a market on the outcome of the 2024-2025 NBA Playoffs first round matchup between the Cleveland Cavaliers and Miami Heat.

question: Will the Thunder beat the Grizzlies 4-0?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Oklahoma City Thunder defeat the Memphis Grizzlies in 4 games, resulting in a 4-0 series outcome. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

If the Memphis Grizzlies win a game in their first round series matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder in the 2024-2025 NBA Playoffs, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be NBA.com.

events.title: NBA Playoffs: Thunder vs. Grizzlies series outcome
events.description: This is a market on the outcome of the 2024-2025 NBA Playoffs first round matchup between the Oklahoma City Thunder and Memphis Grizzlies.

question: Will Aston Villa win on 2025-05-03?
description:
In the upcoming EPL game, scheduled for May 3 at 7:30AM ET,
If Aston Villa wins, this market will resolve to “Yes”.
If Aston Villa loses, this market will resolve to “No”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve “No”.
